title: Bloomberg Markets: Portell on Amazon Customer Centric Approach
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Portell on Amazon Customer Centric Approach
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Greg Portell\u0010Lead Partner of Consumer Industries and Retail Practice\u0010A.T. Kearney\u0010Discussing regulatory approval of Amazon’s deal to purchase and Whole Foods and Amazon to start slashing prices at Whole Foods stores.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
